    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14158</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">L'Inno europeo</string>
            <string language="en">The European Anthem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Europäische Hymne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Hymne Européen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Anthem Europeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ευρωπαϊκός ύμνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Himno Europeo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un testo di input seguito da un quiz e da un cruciverba sulle origini dell'Inno Europeo</string>
            <string language="en">Input text followed by a quiz and a crossword on the origins of the European Anthem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inputtext folgte von einem Quiz und von einem 
Kreuzworträtsel auf den Ursprung der europäischen Hymne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le texte d'entrée a suivi d'un jeu et des mots 
croisé sur les origines du Hymne européen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O texto de entrada seguiu por um quiz e por um 
crossword nas origens do anthem europeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κείμενο εισόδου που ακολουθείται από έναν διαγωνισμό
γνώσεων και ένα σταυρόλεξο στην προέλευση του ευρωπαϊκού ύμνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El texto de entrada de información siguió por un
concurso y un crucigrama en los orígenes del himno europeo.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO è incorporato in una lezione consistente in attività di warm up e di follow up per rendere gli studenti consapevoli di una dimensione europea oltre ogni differenza. Si cerca di fare un passo più vicino a "Uniti nella diversità"</string>
            <string language="en">This LO is incorporated in a lesson plan consisting of suggested warm ups and follow up activities to raise awareness of a European dimension beyond any diversities.
It's trying to ge a step closer to "Unity in Diversity"</string>
          </description>
